thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother bosses forced to intervene as Chloe Ferry has epic meltdown over Calum Best
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother bosses forced to intervene as Chloe Ferry has epic meltdown over Calum Best

author: Nicola Agius
title: Celebrity Big Brother bosses forced to intervene as Chloe Ferry has epic meltdown over Calum Best
text:
Celebrity Big Brother bosses forced to intervene as Chloe Ferry has epic meltdown over Calum Best The Geordie Shore beauty has quite a temper on her Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Chloe Ferry gets trashed by Kim Woodburn on CBB Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Chloe Ferry apparently has very strong feelings for Calum Best. 
So much so that in tonight's episode of Celebrity Big Brother , the Geordie Shore beauty throws a major tantrum when it becomes obvious he's not interested. 
It also doesn't help matters that her very beautiful fellow housemate Jessica Cunningham has admitted she has the hots for Mr Best as well. 
During a fiery confrontation with The Apprentice stunner, Chloe slams her as a "two-faced cow". Chloe (Photo: Channel 5) 
She then goes on to accuse Jessica of making her "feel like f**king s**t". 
Unsurprisingly, the aspiring business woman decides to leave the room, leaving Chloe by herself. Read More 
Still fuming that a potential romance with Calum isn't going to blossom any time soon, she then hurls a cup at the wall - and everybody hears it smash next door including her crush. Celebrity Big Brother (Photo: Channel 5) 
Celebrity Big Brother bosses are then forced to intervene and summon the Geordie star to the Diary Room. 
However, she doesn't calm down her behaviour once she heads over. 
Instead, she carries on venting about her former pal Jessica. View gallery 
"She thinks sheâ€™s a f**king Kardashian," Chloe cries. 
Oh dear, it looks like life in the house is about to get even more uncomfortable for this year's celebs... 
*Celebrity Big Brother returns to Channel 5 tonight at 9pm Like us on Facebook
